content: 8 from cast on edge and begin k2p2 ribbing for ½ complete with a sewn bind off or loosely bind off in pattern repeat for second mitt weave in ends and block if desired **note both left and right mitts are interchangeable due to construction this helps for small children who cannot yet distinguish between left and right but are eager to do things independently 2 © 2013 myla wilson designs you may use this pattern for gifts bartering trades and sales as you wish please give credit for my design not for commercial use or production
